import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./BebidasHeladas.css"; import { emailValidation, minLengthValidation } from '../../../Utils/formValidation'; import { agregarLicorApi } from "../../../Api/licores"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBroom, faCheckCircle, faTimesCircle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { library } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core'; library.add(faCheckCircle, faTimesCircle, faBroom); export default function agregarLicor() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", marca: "", nacionalidad: "", precioUnitario: "", precioBotella: "", restaurante: "", cantidad: "", descripcion: "", foto: "NA" }); // const inputValidation = e => { // const { type, name } = e.target; // // if (type === "email"){ // setFormValid({ // ...formValid, // [name]: emailValidation(e.target) // }); // } const changeForm = e => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; //VALIDAR FROMULARIOS // const [formValid, setFormValid] = useState({ // Codigo: false, // Nombre: false, // Ingredientes: false, // Precio: false, // selectRestaurante: false, // Descrip: false // }) // const show = (e) => { // e.preventDefault(); // const result = agregarBebidaHeladaApi(inputs); // } return ( <> Agregar Licores
